title: The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly stops by a gas station in Melbourne
text:
The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly interrupted his first single date with Angie Kent on Thursday because he 'really needed to pee, aye'.

But despite being hailed an 'everyday hero' for his honesty, it was business as usual for Timm on Tuesday as he stopped by a service station in Melbourne.

The 27-year-old fireproofer was seen running errands in a red T-shirt, South Sydney Rabbitohs shorts and a New York Yankees baseball cap.

Not all heroes wear capes: The Bachelorette fan favourite Timm Hanly wore a T-shirt and Rabbitohs shorts while stopping by a gas station in Melbourne on Tuesday

He completed his casual look with grey sneakers and white socks, and styled his signature long hair in a scruffy bun.

Timm's various tattoos were on display, which may surprise some Bachelorette fans as they have been concealed by long-sleeved tops so far this season.

He was spotted getting out of his car and chatting on his phone, before heading inside the Caltex station and buying a Snickers chocolate bar.

Tatt's unexpected! Timm's various tattoos were on display, which may surprise some Bachelorette fans as they have been concealed by long-sleeved tops so far this season

Fan favourite Timm landed his first single date with Angie, 29, on Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette.

But the romantic moment was spoiled when he decided to relieve himself right in the middle of a deep conversation.

Timm was discussing how he would care for Angie if she became disabled before he blurted out: 'Man, I really need to pee, aye!'

Hilarious moment: Timm interrupted his first single date with Angie Kent (right) on Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette because he 'really needed to pee, aye'

As he walked off to urinate in the bushes, he told producers: 'I'm going to p**s, aye, I'm going to p**s my pants.'

Angie burst into laughter, finding Timm's honesty endearing and genuine.

'He's off taking a whizz! If there is one thing I know for sure, Timm is definitely here for me. I mean, he did not care that we are making a TV show. He just got up and took a whizz and I love it,' she said afterwards.

At least he's honest! As Timm walked off to urinate in the bushes, he told producers: 'I'm going to p**s, aye, I'm going to p**s my pants'
description: The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly interrupted his first single date with Angie Kent on Thursday because he 'really needed to pee, aye'.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
